total_revenue.context: Q2 FY25 consolidated revenue of $96.4B driven by double-digit growth across Search, YouTube, subscriptions, and Cloud.

google_services.context: Google Services revenue, including Search, YouTube ads, subscriptions, and devices.

google_cloud.context: Google Cloud revenue with strong AI, GCP, and Workspace demand; operating income $2.8B, margin 20.7%.

other_bets.context: Other Bets revenue with $1.2B operating loss; continued investment in Waymo, X, and moonshots.

operating_income.context: Operating income benefited from revenue growth and expense efficiency offset by legal charge.

net_income.context: Net income reflecting $1.3B higher depreciation plus $2.7B other income from equity/security gains.

eps.context: Diluted EPS improved 22% year over year.

free_cash_flow.context: Q2 free cash flow of $5.3B and $66.7B TTM.

capital_expenditures.context: CapEx primarily invested in technical infrastructure (servers 2/3, data centers/networking 1/3) to satisfy AI/cloud demand.

google_search.context: Search and other revenues, led by retail and financial services strength.

youtube_advertising.context: YouTube advertising revenue driven by direct response and brand, Shorts monetization, and AI-powered creator tools.

youtube_shorts.context: Shorts averaged over 200M daily views and improved monetization.

youtube_subscriptions.context: Subscription revenue includes YouTube TV, Music, and Premium growth.

backlog.context: Google Cloud backlog up 18% sequentially and 38% YoY.

high_value_deals.context: Deals >$250M doubled YoY and H1 signed same number of $1M+ deals as 2024.

highlights: Gemini 2.5 Pro/Flash, VOI video generation, and Project Astra multimodal research
AI Mode with 100M+ MAUs and AI Overviews driving 10% more queries for served queries
AI agent toolkit including Agent Space, Agent Developer Kit (1M downloads), and open-source support
goals: Embed AI agents across Workspace, Cloud, and Search
Drive organic experiences towards future monetization

highlights: New storage innovations (Anywhere Cache, Rapid Storage) improving latency 5x
AI Hypercomputer and Axion ARM CPUs powering GenAI startups and enterprise demand
Vertex AI + Duet AI assisting customers like PayPal, Deutsche Bank, and Volkswagen
goals: Support $50B+ cloud run-rate with profitable growth
Expand AI infrastructure to meet demand through 2026
Continue margin expansion via efficiency and product leverage

initiatives: Waymo expansion (Atlanta launch, 100M+ autonomous miles, 10 cities tested)
Wing + Walmart drone delivery scaling to 26 locations
X and DeepMind reorganizations, Waymo investment, and headcount reductions
goals: Sharpen portfolio focus on autonomous and AI security offerings
Accelerate innovation while trimming legal/corporate costs
Drive long-term return from moonshot bets

capex.context: Raised CapEx outlook to ~$85B to accelerate server and data center builds.

revenue_growth.context: Search, YouTube, and Cloud momentum expected to continue, tempered by FX volatility.

executive_notes.focus: Sustaining AI leadership while balancing CapEx-driven depreciation
